version_description:
New feature of Foscam APP
[Features]
-Added new adding method of wireless connection;
[Optimization]
-Optimized cameras' removal process;
-Optimized the display and configuration of Wi-Fi settings and coupon pages;
[Improvement]
-Upgraded mobile SDK;
-Fix using ios10.2 and T-mobile LTE cannot access to Foscam camera problem;
-Fix bugs;

* We've added new US and European servers for improved remote connectivity. After updating to Foscam App v.1.7.7, please reboot your camera by unplugging the power source for 10 seconds and then plugging it back in.

Foscam App is the official app that brings you close to home while being away. At Foscam, we make sure you can do what you love but still stay connected to your kids, pets, and home. Here are some key improvements we've made for Foscam App 2.0.

1. Complete User Interface Redesign
We revamped the App interface for a completely new look. Seamlessly navigate to your favorite features with the new app sidebar. Quickly access your camera recordings with Albums. Share your favorite snapshots and video footage with friends and family via social media.

2. Introducing the New Album Feature
Manage and share your snapshots and video footage to Facebook and other social networks through the new Album icon in the Foscam App sidebar.

3. Improved Cloud Service
With the growing popularity of Foscam Cloud, we've made it easier than ever to join. Never miss an alert with live video recordings sent directly to your smartphone. You'll receive alerts with images, and all alarm triggered footage will be automatically saved for certain days depending on your subscription plan. Your privacy always comes first. That's why Foscam Cloud utilizes a cutting edge, encrypted cloud service platform with a team dedicated to your security.

4. Optimized Process to Add New Cameras
We made adding a new camera to Foscam App faster and easier with the new search algorithm. Simply plug your camera into your router and it from the list of connected devices.

5. Added Grouping and Filtering Feature to All the Alerts
We make it easier to navigate your alerts with our new filtering feature. Choose to search by date, camera, and alert type.

6. Support is Just a Tap Away
In the sidebar, we enhanced the Support function. Now you can call or email our 24/7 customer care directly from Foscam App. We also prepared some documents in the "Foscam FAQ" where you can find answers to the most commonly asked questions.

7. Other Changes
We also fixed some bugs and introduced performance improvements to help bring a better experience to you. If you ever have any suggestions, please drop us a note at app@foscaminc.com - we'd greatly appreciate it!

1. Complete User Interface Redesign
We revamped the App interface for a completely new look. Seamlessly navigate to your favorite features with the new app sidebar. Quickly access your camera recordings with Albums. Share your favorite snapshots and video footage with friends and family via social media.

2. Introducing the New Album Feature
Manage and share your snapshots and video footage to Facebook and other social networks through the new Album icon in the Foscam App sidebar.

3. Improved Cloud Service
With the growing popularity of Foscam Cloud, we've made it easier than ever to join. Never miss an alert with live video recordings sent directly to your smartphone. You'll receive alerts with images, and all alarm triggered footage will be automatically saved for certain days depending on your subscription plan. Your privacy always comes first. That's why Foscam Cloud utilizes a cutting edge, encrypted cloud service platform with a team dedicated to your security.

4. Optimized Process to Add New Cameras
We made adding a new camera to Foscam App faster and easier with the new search algorithm. Simply plug your camera into your router and it from the list of connected devices.

5. Added Grouping and Filtering Feature to All the Alerts
We make it easier to navigate your alerts with our new filtering feature. Choose to search by date, camera, and alert type.

6. Support is Just a Tap Away
In the sidebar, we enhanced the Support function. Now you can call or email our 24/7 customer care directly from Foscam App. We also prepared some documents in the "Foscam FAQ" where you can find answers to the most commonly asked questions.

7. Other Changes
We also fixed some bugs and introduced performance improvements to help bring a better experience to you. If you ever have any suggestions, please drop us a note at app@foscaminc.com - we'd greatly appreciate it!

Here are some key improvements of Foscam app 2.0.1

1. Optimized sync-time function
We improved the sync time function for accurate daylight savings adjustment

2. Improved push-notification delivery
Ajusted Foscam app system compatibility to improved push-notification delivery

3. Enhanced sharing fuature by using the iOS's native sharing

4. Fixed livestreaming bugs

Here are some key improvements of Foscam app 2.0.1

1. Optimized sync-time function
We improved the sync time function for accurate daylight savings adjustment

2. Improved push-notification delivery
Ajusted Foscam app system compatibility to improved push-notification delivery

3. Enhanced sharing fuature by using the iOS's native sharing

4. Fixed livestreaming bugs

Here are some key improvements of Foscam app 2.0.2

1. Add a push notification switch in home page
You can easily turn on and off your push message notification by sliding your cameras in Foscam home page.

2. Optimize WiFi only for streaming function
You can quickly and easily change WiFi only switch when viewing your camera and also, we ajusted WiFi only switch into the app settings page.

3. Add share videos function
Now you can share your loving video to your family and friends by selecting in the album

4. Add a voice prompt switch in camera settings page

5. Optimize app interface operations and icons

6. Fix bugs

Here are some key improvements of Foscam app 2.0.2

1. Add a push notification switch in home page
You can easily turn on and off your push message notification by sliding your cameras in Foscam home page.

2. Optimize WiFi only for streaming function

3. Add share videos function

4. Add a voice prompt switch in camera settings page

5. Optimize app interface operations and icons

6. Fix bugs

Here are some key improvements of Foscam app 2.0.6

1. Automatic remider feature for cloud storage
When your cloud storage is expiring, automatic remider will let you know and make sure you don't miss your video in cloud.

2. Additional country options added to account registration form

3. Ability to download the video and capture into system album

4. Fix bugs

Here are some key improvements of Foscam app 2.0.6

1. Automatic remider feature for cloud storage
When your cloud storage is expiring, automatic remider will let you know and make sure you don't miss your video in cloud.

2. Additional country options added to account registration form

3. Ability to download the video and capture into system album

4. Fix bugs

1.Add Foscam family and share devices with your Family members
We bulid "My family" in Foscam account settings page, you can invite your friends join into your family and share your cameras with all of your family menbers;
2.Download Cloud video recordings into mobile phone
Now you can download your Cloud video recordings in Foscam anywhere, anytime.
3.Add environmental temperature alert message with E1
You don't need to warry about is new E1 working well in different location, cause E1 can tell you wether the temperature around is good enough or not.
4.Compatible Foscam new cameras
Foscam new cameras is coming soon, Foscam app is compatible with it already;
5.Fix bugs and adjust some interface copies

Hello, Foscam Users. Sorry to keep you waiting. Our programmers worked overtime and overtime, and after losing a lot of hair, they finally got the iPad compatible in this version. 

Welcome to update and use it. Foscam takes your advice very seriously and will work hard to make this APP .
Thank you for your support！

Hello, Foscam Users. Sorry to keep you waiting. Our programmers worked overtime and overtime, and after losing a lot of hair, they finally got the iPad compatible in this version. 

Welcome to update and use it. Foscam takes your advice very seriously and will work hard to make this APP .
Thank you for your support！

What's new in this version:

1. Optimize the live video connection speed;
2. Added quarter-screen function, supports up to four-channel playback;
3. Add a third-party login for your account and support Facebook and twitter bundle login;
4. Some models have added dual-light night vision mode;
5. Support iPad to watch live in landscape.
